Professional Experience:

NYU Langone Health, New York, NY Lead Developer, 2013 - Present

  • Designed and deployed MongoDB shard totalling 15 database instances (5 replica sets with 3 instances each), 5 config servers, and 5 mongos across 5 servers.
    • Allows the consumption and processing of 30,000 HL7 (ADT_A08 & ADT_A31) messages per day.
    • Easily retain TB's of storage.
  • Designed and implemented the Research Integration Layer that propogates real-time updates across multiple application domains including:
    • IRB (Internal Review Board)
    • CRMS (Clinical Research Managment System)
    • IACUC (Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee)
    • Grants
    • PeopleSoft Finance
